message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with advanced features and exceptional quality. Considering its value, I am offering it to you for $12000. I believe this price reflects its true worth and provides you with an excellent opportunity to own something truly remarkable.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. However, I'm looking for a more reasonable price. Would you consider selling the product for $8500?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value and quality of the product, I propose we settle on a price of $9500. This still reflects the product's worth while being more accessible to you.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of your product, I would like to propose a price of $8000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
